Texts.Chs: 像水獭一样的猎人？和我们很相似吗...
Texts.Eng: Do Otter like Hunt? is quite similar to us...

Texts.Chs: 也许Lutrin也可以和叶族人、耳廓狐一起打猎，看看谁是最好的猎手。可以说水獭是猎人，因为他们用手中的大矛打倒了愤怒的飞鸟。鼠族人后来告诉我们， Lutrin是鲛人的猎物，但现在是鲛人的猎人，就像耳廓狐是鼠族人的猎人一样。 因此， Lutrin认为鲛人就像耳廓狐认为翼族人一样。仍然好奇谁从谁那里得到了语言。以后再问吧。
Texts.Eng: Maybe Lutrin can hunt alongside Floran and Fenerox, too, see who is best hunter. Can tell that otter is hunter because they take down angry flying bird with big spear they is carrying. Kirhos later tell us Lutrin was hunter of Hylotl, but is now hunter for Hylotl, same as Fenerox is hunter for Kirhos. So Lutrin therefore think of Hylotl like Fenerox think of Avian. Still curious about who got language from who. Will ask later.

Texts.Chs: 遇见水獭。他们叫Lutrin。他们也是猎人。它们有锋利的爪子和牙齿。他们还拿着长矛，穿着金属衣服！他们和令人毛骨悚然的瘦鱼一起工作，就像我们和鼠族一起工作一样，尽管我们认为这是 Lutrin 和鲛人之间的不安，因为肢体语言。 有趣的是， Lutrin和我们说话很相似。 是耳廓狐得到了Lutrin语言，还是鼠族人也给了Lutrin语言？
Texts.Eng: Met otter. They called Lutrin. They is hunters, too. They is have sharp claws and teeths. They also carry big spear and wear metal clothing! They work alongside creepy thinky fish like we work alongside Kirhos, though we think is unease between Lutrin and Hylotl because of body language. Also interesting is that Lutrin speak similar to us. Did Fenerox get Lutrin language, or did Kirhos give Lutrin language, too?
